trait.name: Ability Score Increase
trait.text: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and two other ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

trait.name: Ability Score Increase
trait.text: Either your Dexterity or your Intelligence increases by 1 (your choice).

trait.name: Ability Score Increase
trait.text: Two different ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

trait.name: Ability Score Increase
trait.text: Two different ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

trait.name: Ability Score Increase
trait.text: One ability score of your choice increases by 1.

trait.name: Ability Score Increase
trait.text: One ability score of your choice increases by 1.

trait.name: Ability Score Increase
trait.text: Two different ability scores of your choice increase by 1.
